ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work is partially supported by the DST Center of Excellence in Climate Modeling ( http://dcecm.iitd.ac.in/) at IIT Delhi, India. We are thankful to ESGF Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory (LLNL) ( https://esgf-node.llnl.gov/) for providing CMIP5 and AMIP5 model datasets. We are also thankful to ECMWF ( http://apps.ecmwf.int/datasets/) for providing ERA-Interim reanalysis dataset and to NOAA-ESRL Physical Science Division (PSD) for providing the observed GPCP precipitation dataset. The authors would also like to thank the supercomputing facility at IIT Delhi, India. For data analysis and plotting NCAR Command Language Version-6.4.0 ( https://www.ncl.ucar.edu/) and MatLab (R2017b) is used. RP would like to thank MHRD for his PhD fellowship.
